text: The 1943 Tour de Hongrie was the 13th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 24 to 26 June 1943. The race started in Budapest and finished in Kolozsvár. The race was won by István Liszkay. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1943 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 24 June | Budapest to Nagyvárad | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text- align:right;" | 25 June | Nagyvárad to Kolozsvár | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 26 June | Kolozsvár | | Stage cancelled |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text- align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text- align:center;" | 1 | | Törekvés | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Postás | style="text-align:right;" | + 2" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Törekvés | style="text-align:right;" | + 2" |} |} ==Notes and references== 1943 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
